name: Cobos
description: 3rd person arena shooter which is so hard to be completed by weak players.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8 64-bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8 64-bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any
